EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Cloud Native Workshops_Q216.Reminder - St. Louis
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/nj]]>
We will see you tomorrow for the Cloud Native Workshop!
Event details below: Date: March 30, 2016 Time: 8:30 AM - 12:00 PM
Location: EMC Corporation Cardinals Conference Room 600Emerson Rd #400 St. Louis, MO 63141
Please email Chris Busch at cbusch@pivotal.io <[[mailto:cbusch@pivotal.io]]> with any questions.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team
THANKS!!!
